channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Remembering John Simon
item.description: NR’s longtime film critic belonged to a more cultivated, discerning age.

item.title: Washington Gave Bigotry No Sanction. We Should Do the Same
item.description: The measure of American pluralism has never been how well we tolerate those who already think like us.

item.title: How Did Katie Couric Become an Elder Stateswoman of Journalism?
item.description: She has not earned this status.

item.title: Supreme Court Must Stop the Left’s Assault on Pro-Life Pregnancy Centers
item.description: The First Amendment rights of pro-life groups and their financial supporters are under attack.

item.title: Pete Hegseth’s ‘Kill Everybody’ Command
item.description: The secretary of war’s alleged order that led to drug boat–strike survivors’ being killed appears to be a violation of the norms of warfare.

item.title: Trump makes case for tariffs
item.description: Trump on Saturday once again made his plea for the Supreme Court to rule in favor of his sweeping tariffs.

item.title: Texas GOP Rep. Troy Nehls says he's not running again
item.description: Rep. Troy Nehls on Saturday joined the growing list of lawmakers who have announced their impending retirement from Congress.

item.title: Value of State Department press briefings in question as Trump trims them
item.description: The State Department has not held a public press briefing in over three months, even as Washington's rivals intensify their communication campaigns to...

item.title: Ukrainian delegation en route to Washington after previous negotiator resigns
item.description: Ukrainian officials led by Security Council Secretary Rustem Umerov are on their way to Washington on Saturday ahead of negotiations the next day, Ukr...

item.title: White House launches media bias tracker
item.description: The White House has launched a new section on its website dedicated to calling out media it considers misleading or having a bias in its coverage of P...

item.title: 80 Years After Nuremberg Condemned Nazi Research, Doctors Are Still Committing Atrocities
item.description: Perpetuating false definitions of the earliest stages of life mirrors the dehumanization that enabled Nazi experiments on the 'subhuman.'

item.title: The Ultimate Gift Guide For The Trad Wife In Your Life
item.description: Twenty-five gift ideas to make merry every homemaker you're shopping for this Christmas.

item.title: These Do-Ahead Meals Are The Easiest Three-Course Dinner Parties You’ll Ever Host
item.description: These make-ahead, hard-to-mess-up combinations involve just enough effort to turn a weeknight gathering into a memorable meal.

item.title: America Is Still Worth Giving Thanks For
item.description: For the frustrated and disillusioned on the right, here are four foundational reasons to give thanks for this great country.

item.title: On Target: The Perfect Guide To Gifting Your Favorite Firearm-Loving Friends And Family
item.description: Get the most bang for your buck with these nine gun-themed gift suggestions.
